getCard

public Card getCard(int n)
Returns a reference to the card specified by n. It does not remove the card from the stack.

Parameters:
n - - which card (from the top of this stack) you want
Returns:
a reference to the nth card in the stack (returns null if the nth card does not exist)

Returns:

getTopCard

public Card getTopCard()
Returns a reference to the card on the top of the stack. It does not remove the card from the stack.

Returns:
a reference to the top card in the stack (returns null if there are no cards in the stack)

getWidth

public int getWidth()
Returns the width of the stack

Returns:
the width of the stack

getX

public int getX()
Returns the x coordinate of the stack

Returns:
x coordinate of the upper left corner

getY

public int getY()
Returns the y coordinate of the stack

Returns:

pop

public Card pop()
Pops the top Card off the Stack

Returns:
The Card or null (if nothing is in the stack)

pop

public StackOfCards2 pop(int n)
Pops n cards off the Stack

Parameters:
n - - the number of cards to pop off the stack
Returns:
The Card(s) in a StackOfCards2 or null (if nothing is in the stack)

push

public void push(Card card)
Pushes the Card onto the Stack. The sizing of the card will be changed to the sizing of the stack

Parameters:
card - - a reference to a Card

setEmptyStackPicture

public void setEmptyStackPicture(java.lang.String filename)
Sets the image of an empty stack (what will be drawn if no cards are in the stack)

Parameters:
filename - - the jpath and filename as a string

setHeight

public void setHeight(int h)
Sets the height of the stack (and all cards put in the stack) The width is also set to maintain the appropriate ratio

Parameters:
h - - the height of the stack (and all cards put in it)

Parameters:

whichCardContains

public int whichCardContains(int x,
                             int y)
Determines which card in the stack the given coordinates are on

Parameters:
x - - x coordinate
y - - y coordinate
Returns:
the card number (from the top), (returns -1 if the coordinates do not fall on a card in this stack)
